name: 洪媽益
objective: 探討印刷媒體、放映性媒體與電子媒體之特性，及英文在各類媒體應用之道；培養學生科技、商業、及教學媒體之賞析與應用能力。
schedule:
March 1 Course introduction
March 8 Academic English, writing an abstract
March 15 Newspaper English, writing a journal/magazine news article
March 22 Writing a Review / Letter to editor / Feature
March 29 Writing a CV
April 5 holiday
April 12 Jobhunting and Employment-related Correspondence 
April 19 Writing a Feature item
April 26 Writing a cover letter and preparing for an interview
May 3 English for Emails
May 10 English for Advertising
May 17 English for Meetings
May 24 TBA
May 31 Going on a trip (presentations)
June 7 Make-up reports due
scorePolicy:
Weekly tasks: 70%
Final presentation: 30%
Extra points or deductions for accomplished/failed tasks.
